description:
Simply download the folder, extract it, and run the 2048.exe! I promise it's not a virus, although windows defender seems to very much think it is. Feel free to give me any feedback, although it is unlikely that I will be updating the game, I just wanted to have a place to store my work, so I can look back on where I've come from sometime in the future. Hint: if you press '`' fun things happen.

Have fun!
